pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Saturday, April 15, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local 

Greater Toronto Area, Ontario 

9:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an orthodox Easter service at a local church. He will be joined by the Minister of International Trade, Export Promotion, Small Business and Economic Development, Mary Ng, and the Minister of Public Services and Procurement, Helena Jaczek.

 Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
